title: Nearing a COVID-19 vaccine approval in China, Fosun gears up to launch BioNTech shot: report
author: Kevin Dunleavy
description: China's approval of the mRNA COVID-19 vaccine developed by BioNTech appears likely within the next few months and, thanks to a deal made between the biotech and China's Fosun Pharma, the shot will | With their COVID-19 vaccine expected to be approved in China by the summer, BioNTech and Fosun are gearing up for production in the culmination of a deal struck between the companies in March 2020.
